sentences.sCn: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”
“你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.sContent: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.sCn: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.sContent: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.sCn: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.sContent: Sixty percent of people voted no.
If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.sCn: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

sentences.sContent: ...there is no such thing as a “perfect” memory—their extraordinary minds are still using the same flawed tools that the rest of us rely on...
...there is almost no hard evidence for midlife crisis other than a few small pilot studies conducted decades ago...
...I have no question that when you have a team...
...they take action and immediately drop what’s no longer serving their purpose...
...’ She then realized that her life no longer matched her vision for it...
...they seem to be no better than average at recalling impersonal information...
...So it’s no surprise that cultures around the world celebrate spring by honoring the egg...

trans.tranOther: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request
